comment.body:
It is obvious, the left has not stopped rotting it, with all these elements that are useless.
As a last date, over the last ten years, the trojan horse systemd has finished the work, all the major distributions are now all poxed.

Even Arch linux, which is supposed to be minimalist, has adopted this crap. You can say goodbye to all these distro, it's been a long time 
since I fired all this crap and these useless elements,

and came back to the basics of Unix: DOING ONLY ONE THING AT A TIME.
I laugh so much on the forums
when I see 'all these idiots who can no longer' run their computers with linux,
which is the opposite of Complexity, the masses are brainless idiots.

"Government Seeks to Eliminate Internet Anonymity"
good for them,
these idiots that are the mass will suffer, but that's their problem.
lol
